Question: Robolaunch CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
robolaunch

Product: Industry Cloud Platform

- Enables developers with extensive tools and frameworks for AI, robotics, and autonomous driving
- Simplifies the development process and empowers developers with a single interface
- Offers live demos and showcases at CES 2024
- Achieves indoor environment process digitalization with InsightBot
- Provides 20x GPU utilization improvement and geographical scalability
- Selected as one of the winners of Finland-Turkiye Startup Competition
- Expanding horizons in Europe and deepening ecosystem engagement
- Empowers Smart City Revolution with orchestration and control of robots and devices
- Listed on NVIDIA's Accelerated Applications Catalog
- Offers engaging discussions on realizing cutting-edge AI, robotics, and autonomous driving use cases at CES 2024 booth 63233
Summary_cn:
robolaunch

产品：行业云平台

- 为人工智能、机器人和自动驾驶开发人员提供广泛的工具和框架
- 简化开发过程，为开发人员提供单一界面的支持
- 在CES 2024上提供实时演示和展示
- 使用InsightBot实现室内环境过程数字化
- 提供20倍的GPU利用率提升和地理可伸缩性
- 被选为芬兰-土耳其创业大赛的获奖者之一
- 在欧洲拓展视野，深化生态系统的参与
- 通过对机器人和设备的编程与控制，推动智能城市革命
- 登录NVIDIA的加速应用目录
- 在CES 2024展位63233上进行关于实现尖端人工智能、机器人和自动驾驶用例的深入讨论
